resources.title: Campus Counseling Services
resources.description: Free and confidential counseling for students. Book appointments or join drop-in hours for mental health support.

resources.title: Student Fitness Program
resources.description: Weekly group fitness classes and personalized plans to help you stay active. Open to all levels.

resources.title: Nutrition Advice & Meal Planning
resources.description: Meet with a nutrition advisor to build healthy, affordable meal plans tailored to student life.

resources.title: Daily Routines for Wellbeing
resources.description: Simple morning and evening routines to improve mood, focus, and sleep. Includes short habits you can start today.

resources.title: Yoga for Beginners
resources.description: Beginner-friendly yoga sequences to build flexibility and reduce stress. Watch guided videos below.
